> > Hey Soulstice, Dracona may make it if she doens't tick off Megatron.
> > Yeah, Beast Wars, Beast Machines, and Transformers in general. They
> > are all cool.  I happen to be trying for my Vet degree in collage.
> > But Tarantulas and scorpions are cool critters. DarkMouse will do
> > what she can. But keep out of Megatron's way.  He's a lot meaner this
> > time.) hehehe
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > Logomorph? Oh! I get it, it sounds like Lagomorph! Clever. I got

> > alot. Got 2

> > are my

> > the
